---
title: "Visualization Data India"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
# load in tidyverse
library(tidyverse)

# make a new variable from the csv file data and filter for data on 2015
India_2015 <- read_csv('India_data_filtered.csv') %>% 
  filter(year == '2015') 

# make a new variable with the summarized number of deaths in India in 2015
summarized_India_2015 <- summarize(India_2015, total = sum(deaths_best_estimate))

```
```{r}
# creating a bar graph of the summarized data India 2015
ggplot(data = summarized_India_2015) +
  geom_bar( mapping = aes ( 
    x = "India 2015", y = total +
      xlab ("India 2015") +
      ylab ("Best estimates of deaths") +
      ggtitle ("Estimated deaths in India in 2015")
    ))

```
